name: Plaid
description: Integrate with Plaid to get, get, get and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: Get Accounts
tools.description: Get linked bank accounts via Plaid. Requires an access token. Returns account names, types, balances, and IDs.

tools.name: Get Transactions
tools.description: Get transactions for linked accounts via Plaid. Specify a date range and optional account filter.

tools.name: Get Balance
tools.description: Get real-time account balances via Plaid. Returns current and available balances for all linked accounts.

tools.name: Get Identity
tools.description: Get identity information for account holders via Plaid. Returns names, addresses, emails, and phone numbers.

tools.name: Get Institutions
tools.description: Search for financial institutions supported by Plaid. Returns institution names, IDs, and supported products.
